Test Name: Mycoplasma pneumoniae Antibodies, IgG and IgM, Serum
Purpose: Detection and quantification of Mycoplasma pneumoniae IgG and IgM antibodies to aid in diagnosing Mycoplasma pneumoniae infections.
Container: Red-top tube or serum separator tube (SST)
Equipment: ELISA kit for Mycoplasma pneumoniae antibodies and microplate reader
